com.interpss.core.aclf.adj

Interface SwitchedShunt

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AclfBusControl, BaseBusBranchControl, com.hazelcast.nio.serialization.DataSerializable, org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject, IAclfAdjustment, IShuntQFunc, NameTag, org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.Notifier, PVBusLimit, RemoteQBus
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    StaticVarCompensator
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    StaticVarCompensatorImpl, SwitchedShuntImpl

    public interface SwitchedShunt
extends RemoteQBus, IShuntQFunc
    A representation of the model object 'Switched Shunt'. Use the parent Bus ShuntCompensators to control a Bus (could be a remote bus) voltage or remote branch Mvar flow.

    The following features are supported:

    • BInit
    • Remote Control Percentage
    • BActual
    • Remote Control Group Id
    • Shunt Compensator List
    See Also:
    AclfAdjustPackage.getSwitchedShunt()

      • getShuntCompensatorList

        org.eclipse.emf.common.util.EList<ShuntCompensator> getShuntCompensatorList()
        Returns the value of the 'Shunt Compensator List' containment reference list. The list contents are of type ShuntCompensator. for storing bus capacitor Q. Please note: a bus might have shunt Q and SwithedShunt devices at the same time.
        Returns:
        the value of the 'Shunt Compensator List' containment reference list.
        See Also:
        AclfAdjustPackage.getSwitchedShunt_ShuntCompensatorList()

      • getRemoteControlPercentage

        double getRemoteControlPercentage()
        Returns the value of the 'Remote Control Percentage' attribute. The default value is "100.0". remote voltage or Mvar control participation percentage
        Returns:
        the value of the 'Remote Control Percentage' attribute.
        See Also:
        setRemoteControlPercentage(double), AclfAdjustPackage.getSwitchedShunt_RemoteControlPercentage()
